SEARCH
Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
com.hotelapplication.backend.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The Reservation class represents a single hotel reservation. It includes details such as the assigned user, room ID, hotel ID, start and end dates of the reservation, and total price. This class provides methods to manage and retrieve reservation details, calculate the stay duration, and print a receipt.
Author:
Ethan Mojahedi

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(int reservationNumber, int assignedUserID, int roomID, int hotelID, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, double totalPrice)
      Constructs a new Reservation object with specified details.
      Parameters:
      reservationNumber - Unique reservation number.
      assignedUserID - User ID associated with the reservation.
      roomID - Room ID for the reservation.
      hotelID - Hotel ID where the reservation was made.
      startDate - Start date of the reservation.
      endDate - End date of the reservation.
      totalPrice - Total price for the reservation.
